long_description: At home on wet, muddy and chaotic cyclocross courses, the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX Bike offers a versatile and capable riding platform for racing in any weather. Fully butted 7005 aluminum frame delivers a light, stiff and responsive platform; formed top tube features a flat bottom to make it easy to carry the bike on your shoulder. Full-carbon fork with tapered 1.5 in. steerer reduces weight while maintaining strength, enhancing front-end stiffness and ensuring responsive handling. BB30 bottom bracket shell design increases stiffness and improves power transfer. FSA Gossamer PRO Cross crankset pairs with a 12-27 cassette for great 'cross gearing, whether sprinting for the line or slogging it through the sand. Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters supply precise, fast shifts across the 20 gearing options so you're in the right gear when you need it. Tektro cantilever brakes deliver confident stopping power and plenty of mud clearance. Pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX Cyclocross Bike are subject to change. Overstock.
short_description: At home on wet, muddy and chaotic cyclocross courses, the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX Bike offers a versatile and capable riding platform for racing in any weather.
